page.title: 07BENINGTON VILLAGE HALL
page.content: Benington Village Hall is fairly old it is made of wood.These are some of the things that go on in the hall -womens' meetings, old peoples committee, weddings and old peoples parties.The old people also have a trip,in{1984}they went to Emmerdale Farm and in{1985}they are going to the Norfolk Broads.The children in Benington also have a party and a trip to Skegness The pub gives us a packet of crisps and the shop gives us sweets.At Christmas we have a bingo.We have a few jumble sales in winter.We have a garden fete every year in the vicarage garden but if its wet we have it inside the village hall.The pub has a barbeque outside the tickets are{Â£1.50 for adults and{Â£1.00}for children. In May we have a stuffed chine and ham supper.
